readable.title: 972381743_5677b420ab
readable.content: A girl all in black and white , and carrying an umbrella , walks down the street , as others watch . A girl dressed in black and white with mime makeup stands in the middle of a street with a white umbrella and black top hat in her hand . a performer dancing in the streets wearing an exotic outfit a woman with a shaved head dressed in black and white in a parade The lady in the street is wearing a white and black costume and is carrying a white umbrella .
